content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Copper Mining and Smelting System at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0) mining copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0) smelting copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-24.5, -58.5) storing output plates
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5) moving plates from furnace to chest

###Iron Mining and Processing Complex (-10 to -4, -60 to -55)
Consists of three mining drills in sequence:
1. First mining drill at (-10.0, -59.0)
2. Middle mining drill at (-8.0, -59.0)
3. Last mining drill at (-6.0, -59.0)
Supporting infrastructure:
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5) collecting ore
- Network of burner inserters at (-6.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -56.5), (-4.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -56.5) moving materials
- Transport belt system connecting components

###Iron Smelting Array (0 to 6, 0 to 2)
Four parallel smelting lines, each consisting of:
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (4.0, 0.0), (6.0, 0.0)
- Input inserters and chests above furnaces
- Output inserters and chests below furnaces at (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if target location is clear before placing new entities
- When placing collection chests, ensure the drop position of mining drills is not already occupied

### Entity blockage issues
- Mining drill outputs are being blocked due to missing or full output containers
- Furnace belts are blocked at drop positions - ensure proper item flow through the system
- Set up proper item collection systems before starting mining/processing operations

### Resource management
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices regularly
- Ensure all burner entities (drills, inserters) have adequate coal supply
- Set up refueling systems to maintain continuous operation
